args:
Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no".
The Senate Foreign Relations Committee is voting on Marco Rubio. Chairman James E. Risch (R-Idaho) said...
The Senate Foreign Relations Committee is voting on Marco Rubio. Chairman James E. Risch (R-Idaho) said most votes are in and no one has voted against him. As soon as he is voted out of committee, Risch will report the vote to the floor. He predicted that Rubio will be secretary of state by nightfall.
